summary: PMCC Screener verification completed. All 14 backend tests passed, 6 skipped (expected - some tests require PMCC results which depend on market conditions). The PMCC screener is correctly isolated from CC logic with all rules properly implemented: LEAPS DTE 365-730 days, ITM strikes, ASK pricing for buys, short calls ≤60 DTE, BID pricing for sells, net_debit = leap_ask - short_bid.
critical_code_review_comments: ✓ PMCC LEAPS DTE: 365-730 days (12-24 months) - VERIFIED in code (lines 1081-1082) and API response
✓ PMCC LEAPS ITM: Strike < stock price - VERIFIED (all 6 results have leap_itm: true)
✓ PMCC LEAPS ASK pricing: BUY leg uses ASK only - VERIFIED (leap_cost = leap_ask)
✓ PMCC Short DTE: ≤60 days - VERIFIED in code (line 1084) and API response
✓ PMCC Short strike > LEAP strike - VERIFIED (all results have short_above_leap: true)
✓ PMCC Short BID pricing: SELL leg uses BID only - VERIFIED (short_premium = short_bid)
✓ PMCC Net Debit: leap_ask - short_bid - VERIFIED (calculated matches returned value)
✓ PMCC Both BID and ASK > 0 rule - VERIFIED (all results have bid_ask_valid: true)
✓ CC DTE range: 7-45 days - VERIFIED (separate from PMCC)
✓ PMCC completely isolated from CC logic - VERIFIED (separate constants, separate endpoint)

success_rate.backend: 100% (14/14 passed, 6 skipped due to market conditions)

seed_data_creation: None - used live Yahoo Finance API data
context_for_next_testing_agent: PMCC screener fully verified. All PMCC rules are correctly implemented and isolated from CC logic. Key findings: 1) LEAPS DTE 365-730 days (12-24 months), 2) LEAPS must be ITM (strike < stock price), 3) LEAPS use ASK price, 4) Short calls ≤60 DTE, 5) Short strike > LEAP strike, 6) Short calls use BID price, 7) Net debit = leap_ask - short_bid, 8) Both BID and ASK must be > 0. CC screener still works with DTE 7-45 days.

rules_verified.leaps_dte_365_730: PASS - All results have leap_dte between 365-730 days
rules_verified.leaps_itm: PASS - All results have leap_strike < stock_price
rules_verified.short_above_leap: PASS - All results have short_strike > leap_strike
rules_verified.bid_ask_positive: PASS - All BID and ASK values > 0

dte_isolation_verification.isolation_status: VERIFIED - No overlap between CC and PMCC LEAPS DTE ranges

mocked_apis.note: All data from real Yahoo Finance API
